title: Design Thinking-Based Medical Education Innovation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and human anatomy
context.additional_context: Emphasis on creative approaches to solving complex problems in real-world medical settings. Establishing a collaborative and prototyping environment using personal devices.

learning_goals: Students can systematically solve medical field problems using the 5-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to design patient-centered innovative care solutions and test them in real-world settings
Participants can develop creative approaches for medical data analysis and treatment protocol improvement using generative AI tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
